column20: Normal Attack: Perform up to 5 rapid strikes.
column21: Charged Attack: Consumes a certain amount of Stamina to unleash 2 rapid sword strikes.
column22: Plunging Attack: Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground below, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.
column169: #Bennett puts all his fire and passion for adventuring into his sword. Results may vary based on how fired up he is...
column170: Press: A single, swift flame strike that deals Pyro DMG.
column171: Hold (Short): Charges up, resulting in different effects when unleashed based on the Charge Level. • Level 1: Strikes twice, dealing Pyro DMG and launching opponents. • Level 2: Unleashes 3 consecutive attacks that deal impressive Pyro DMG, but the last attack triggers an explosion that launches both Bennett and the enemy. Bennett takes no damage from being launched.
column254: Bennett performs a jumping attack that deals Pyro DMG, creating an Inspiration Field.
column255: Inspiration Field: • If the health of a character within the AoE is equal to or falls below 70%, their health will continuously regenerate. The amount of HP restored scales off Bennett's Max HP. • If the health of a character within the AoE is higher than 70%, they gain an ATK Bonus that is based on Bennett's Base ATK. • Imbues characters within the AoE with Pyro.
column352: Rekindle: Decreases Passion Overload's CD by 20%.
column353: Fearnaught: Within the area created by Fantastic Voyage, Passion Overload takes on the following effects: • CD is reduced by 50%. • Bennett will not be launched by the effects of Charge Level 2.
column354: Grand Expectation: Fantastic Voyage's ATK increase no longer has an HP restriction, and gains an additional 20% of Bennett's Base ATK.
column355: Impasse Conqueror: When Bennett's HP falls below 70%, his Energy Recharge is increased by 30%.
column356: Unstoppable Fervor: Increases the Level of Passion Overload by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column357: Unexpected Odyssey: Using a Normal Attack when executing the second attack of Passion Overload's Charge Level 1 allows an additional attack to be performed. This additional attack does 135% of the second attack's DMG.
column358: True Explorer: Increases the Level of Fantastic Voyage by 3. Maximum upgrade level is 15.
column359: Fire Ventures with Me: Sword, Claymore, or Polearm-wielding characters inside Fantastic Voyage's radius gain a 15% Pyro DMG Bonus and their weapons are infused with Pyro.
